coreAttributes.authorTag: A logo on the side reveals that the mead was packaged by MintyChip Foods.
coreAttributes.name: Honey Mead
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle of 'Honey Mead' appears to contain, much as its name would suggest, a generous helping of some sort of alcoholic mead. The label proudly promises it is made with pure bee-girl honey.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the cap off the bottle of Honey Mead, before tilting [npc.her] head back and gulping down the golden brown liquid. Quickly finishing off the entire bottle, [npc.name] [npc.verb(savours)] the faint, sweet aftertaste that remains.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the cap off the bottle of Honey Mead, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and making [npc2.herHim] gulp down the golden brown liquid. Quickly finishing off the entire bottle, [npc2.name] [npc.verb(savours)] the faint, sweet aftertaste that remains.
